column5: Thank you for your answer, but l need driven key not blend shape (shapekey or morph targets). As in picture, I need the curve control in Unreal.
There are plugins like this in Unreal and showcases in youtube. But I want to create it myself from scratch

Although docs are great, but try this. It have everything for people who don't want to read...

[learn.unrealengine.com](https://learn.unrealengine.com)
I hope those who cheered you with their comment have the same feeling
do you even remember that time? anyway wish you a good year
seeing other people like me feels good, I wish all of you well don't get me wrong, but not being alone in this makes me happy
WOW, thanks man. it was great information...
Good to know man, good to know
